intro: Psychotria hilonghilongensis, commonly known as the Mindanao Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Philippines, specifically found in the lowland rainforests of Mindanao. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It produces small, red berries that are often consumed by local wildlife. Due to its restricted habitat and threats from deforestation, it is considered a vulnerable species.
